scripts.server: env -u https_proxy -u http_proxy -u ALL_PROXY bash -c 'nodemon server.js'
scripts.client: env -u https_proxy -u http_proxy -u ALL_PROXY bash -c 'node client.js'
scripts.test: env -u https_proxy -u http_proxy -u ALL_PROXY bash -c 'grpc_cli call localhost:50051 helloworld.Greeter.SayHello "name: \"John\""'
